name: Wii U Panorama View: Trailer
overview: Wii U Panorama View opens a new window on the sights and sounds of the world’s exotic locales. Watch these destinations come alive around you in the comfort of your living room! Take control of an immersive 360-degree guided tour with the Wii U™ console’s GamePad controller. Videos are available for purchase on Nintendo eShop. • Explore the sights and sounds of exotic locations from any angle right from the your living room • Set out on a 360 degree guided tour using the Wii Utm GamePad controller • Share your viewing experience with friends and family on your TV screen • Tour London by double-decker bus, witness the Cherry Blossoms of Kyoto by rickshaw, march in the Carnival parade in Rio de Janeiro, and more • Download a free demo of Wii U Panorama View now in the Nintendo eShop for a sampling of these amazing experiences. The full version of each video tour can be purchased in the US for just $2.00 each. Price varies in other countries
